lead_paragraph: The trainer Kiaran McLaughlin almost won the Derby a decade ago with a 71-1 long-shot, and he is hoping this year Frosted can give him his first win.

headline.main: Trainer Seeks the Finish He Started 10 Years Ago
headline.print_headline: Trainer Seeks the Finish He Started 10 Years Ago

snippet: The trainer Kiaran McLaughlin almost won the Derby a decade ago with a 71-1 long-shot, and he is hoping this year Frosted can give him his first win.
